Articles.Content:
The International Space Security Organization needs an new spacecraft fleet. Also, i have created this topic to allow you post your spacecrafts and ideas.

The ISSA needs this spacecrafts:

Drone/Aircraft Carrier

Mobile Munar Landing Vehicle

Space/Munar Patrol Vehicle

Space Station

Spy Sattelite

Communication Sattelite

Sattelite Launcher

Manned Spacecraft Launcher

Sub-Orbital Scout/Spy vehicle

Allowed Parts:

Stock, C7, C7 Experimental and Silisko

Thank you for your ideas!
